content:
TextDataBindingHandler Class

Definition

Provides a data-binding handler for a data-bound control at design time.

In this Article

public class TextDataBindingHandler : System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingHandler
Inheritance
Object
System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingHandler
TextDataBindingHandler

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

The TextDataBindingHandler object is a data-binding handler that can provide data to a data-bound text property at design time. Data-binding handlers are used when there is no designer for the control present that would otherwise provide the data for the data bound property.

Constructors

TextDataBindingHandler()

Initializes a new instance of the TextDataBindingHandler class.

public TextDataBindingHandler ();

Methods

DataBindControl(IDesignerHost,Control)

Data-binds the specified control.

public override void DataBindControl (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, System.Web.UI.Control control);
designerHost
IDesignerHost

An object implementing IDesignerHost for the document that contains the control.

control
Control

The Control to data-bind.

Remarks

The DataBindControl method of TextDataBindingHandler sets the Text property of the control, if it exists, to a sample data string.

This method should be implemented in a derived class to provide functionality to a custom data-binding handler. The logic for the data-binding should be implemented within this method, and can be specific to the type or types that the handler is binding a property or properties on.
